RESUME_TIPS: Emphasize experience with **deep learning frameworks** like TensorFlow or PyTorch in the skills section to match the job description.
Add details on **model deployment** and **MLOps** practices, highlighting any experience with Docker or CI/CD pipelines.
Showcase experience with **data visualization tools** such as Tableau, Power BI, Matplotlib, Seaborn, or Plotly with specific examples in your projects.
Include projects or experiences that demonstrate proficiency in **A/B testing** or **experimental design**, quantifying the impact of changes.
Detail your experience with **data wrangling**, **cleaning**, and **feature engineering** explicitly, mentioning specific techniques used.
If you have experience with **cloud platforms** like AWS, Azure, or GCP and their ML services, add this to your skills and experience sections.
Add a section detailing **experience with NoSQL databases** if applicable, mentioning specific database types you have worked with.
Expand on your experience with **regression, classification, and clustering**, providing specific examples of model implementation.
Include any experience with **anomaly detection** and **optimization** techniques, demonstrating their application in solving real-world problems.
Highlight any experience with **causal inference analysis**, showing how you've determined the true impact of interventions.

TensorFlow.DESCRIPTION: Learn to use TensorFlow to build scalable AI-powered applications with deep learning. Covers basic TensorFlow concepts, building image recognition models, and using natural language processing.

This Professional Certificate program is designed to provide learners with practical skills and knowledge in artificial intelligence (AI) and programming. Students will gain hands-on experience using popular libraries and frameworks like TensorFlow and Keras to develop AI applications.
A comprehensive tutorial for beginners to get started with TensorFlow, covering basic concepts and practical examples.

PyTorch.DESCRIPTION: Learn the basics of deep learning and neural networks with PyTorch. Covers tensors, linear regression, logistic regression, and neural network architectures.
Learn AI skills such as machine learning, data science, and ethical AI practices with Microsoft's Professional Program in AI. Covers AI concepts, Python programming, and machine learning frameworks.

PyTorch.COURSE_NAME: PyTorch for Deep Learning with Python Full Course
PyTorch.DESCRIPTION: A comprehensive tutorial for deep learning with PyTorch in Python, covering neural networks, convolutional neural networks, and recurrent neural networks.

Keras.DESCRIPTION: Learn the foundations of Deep Learning, understand how to build neural networks, and learn to lead successful machine learning projects. Uses Keras and TensorFlow.

Keras.COURSE_NAME: Introduction to Deep Learning with Keras
Keras.DESCRIPTION: Introduction to Deep Learning with Keras. Use Keras to quickly build neural networks to solve a variety of problems. Introduction to Deep Learning with Keras.

Keras.COURSE_NAME: Keras tutorial - CNN, ANN, and RNN Deep Learning with Python
Keras.DESCRIPTION: In this Keras tutorial, we cover the basic API for Keras using Tensorflow in the backend.

XGBoost.DESCRIPTION: Learn to apply machine learning algorithms in Python. Covers various algorithms including XGBoost.
Learn advanced machine learning techniques using Python. Covers XGBoost and other ensemble methods.
Learn how to use XGBoost with scikit-learn in Python. A comprehensive tutorial.

A/B Testing.DESCRIPTION: A series of courses to help you learn and implement A/B testing methodologies.
Learn how to design, conduct, and analyze experiments for business decisions. Covers A/B testing and other experimental methods.
A tutorial on A/B testing for data science.

Causal Inference.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to infer causal relationships from data.

Causal Inference.COURSE_NAME: Causal Diagrams: Draw Your Assumptions Before Your Conclusions
Causal Inference.DESCRIPTION: This course explores the fundamentals of causal diagrams, also known as Directed Acyclic Graphs (DAGs), and how they can be used to represent causal assumptions.
A tutorial on the basics of causal inference.

MLOps.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to deploy, monitor, and manage machine learning models in production.

MLOps.COURSE_NAME: MLOps: Continuous Delivery and Automation Pipelines in Machine Learning
MLOps.DESCRIPTION: This course covers the essential concepts, tools, and techniques for building robust and automated MLOps pipelines, enabling you to streamline the deployment and management of machine learning models in real-world applications.
This course teaches you how to build an end-to-end production ready model.

Tableau.DESCRIPTION: A comprehensive introduction to Tableau and data visualization techniques.

Tableau.COURSE_NAME: Analyzing and Visualizing Data with Power BI
Tableau.DESCRIPTION: In this course, you will learn how to use Microsoft Power BI to create impactful data visualizations and insightful reports.
A comprehensive tutorial on using Tableau for data visualization.

Power BI.COURSE_NAME: Microsoft Power BI Data Analyst Professional Certificate
Power BI.DESCRIPTION: This series of courses provides you with hands-on experience in extracting, transforming, loading, and analyzing data using Power BI.

Power BI.COURSE_NAME: Analyzing and Visualizing Data with Power BI
Power BI.DESCRIPTION: Learn the core data analysis and visualization functions of Microsoft Power BI.
Power BI tutorial for beginners to learn basic concepts step by step.

Docker.DESCRIPTION: Containers are revolutionizing software development. This course teaches you how to use Docker for Data Science.

This course offers a comprehensive introduction to the world of containerization. It's designed to equip participants with the foundational knowledge and practical skills needed to effectively utilize container technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes.
Docker tutorial for beginners to learn basic concepts step by step.

AWS.DESCRIPTION: Explore machine learning on the Amazon Web Services (AWS) Cloud. Learn about AWS machine learning services and how to use them.

This course is designed to help individuals learn the core aspects of cloud computing on Amazon Web Services (AWS). It provides a foundational understanding of cloud concepts, AWS services, and best practices for building and deploying applications in the cloud.

Azure.DESCRIPTION: A fundamental course introducing Azure's AI capabilities.
This program provides you with the skills and knowledge to succeed as a Data Scientist using Microsoft Azure. You will gain hands-on experience with tools like Azure Machine Learning.

GCP.COURSE_NAME: Google Cloud Platform Fundamentals: Core Infrastructure
GCP.DESCRIPTION: This course introduces you to the Google Cloud Platform (GCP) and the core infrastructure services it offers.

GCP.COURSE_NAME: Data Engineering on Google Cloud Platform Specialization
GCP.DESCRIPTION: Transform your career and become a data engineering expert in this Specialization. Learn how to design, build, and maintain data processing systems on Google Cloud Platform.
